verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> when Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his army, <S%H2428><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> of his dominion, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4475><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> thereof, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> Go <S%H1980><s%> and speak <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> <S%H413><s%> him, Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and he shall burn <S%H8313><s%> it with fire: <S%H784><s%>

And thou <S%H859><s%> shalt not <S%H3808><s%> escape <S%H4422><s%> out of his hand, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> shalt surely be taken, <S%H8610><s%> <S%H8610><s%> and delivered <S%H5414><s%> into his hand; <S%H3027><s%> and thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall behold <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and he shall speak <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee mouth <S%H6310><s%> to mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and thou shalt go <S%H935><s%> to Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

Yet <S%H389><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> O Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah; <S%H3063><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of <S%H5921><s%> thee, Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> by the sword: <S%H2719><s%>

But thou shalt die <S%H4191><s%> in peace: <S%H7965><s%> and with the burnings <S%H4955><s%> of thy fathers, <S%H1><s%> the former <S%H7223><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, so <S%H3651><s%> shall they burn <S%H8313><s%> odors for thee; and they will lament <S%H5594><s%> thee, saying, Ah <S%H1945><s%> lord! <S%H113><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> have pronounced <S%H1696><s%> the word, <S%H1697><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Then Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%>

When the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon's <S%H894><s%> army <S%H2428><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> that were left, <S%H3498><s%> against <S%H413><s%> Lachish, <S%H3923><s%> and against <S%H413><s%> Azekah: <S%H5825><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> these <S%H2007><s%> defensed <S%H4013><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> remained <S%H7604><s%> of the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

This is the word <S%H1697><s%> that <S%H834><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> after that <S%H310><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> had made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with <S%H854><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were at Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> to proclaim <S%H7121><s%> liberty <S%H1865><s%> unto them;

That every man <S%H376><s%> should let <S%H853><s%> his manservant, <S%H5650><s%> and every man <S%H376><s%> <S%H853><s%> his maidservant, <S%H8198><s%> being a Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> or a Hebrewess, <S%H5680><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> free; <S%H2670><s%> that none <S%H1115><s%> <S%H376><s%> should serve <S%H5647><s%> himself of them, to wit, of a Jew <S%H3064><s%> his brother. <S%H251><s%>

Now when all <S%H3605><s%> the princes, <S%H8269><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> had entered <S%H935><s%> into the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that every one <S%H376><s%> should let <S%H853><s%> his manservant, <S%H5650><s%> and every one <S%H376><s%> <S%H853><s%> his maidservant, <S%H8198><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> free, <S%H2670><s%> that none <S%H1115><s%> should serve <S%H5647><s%> themselves of them any more, <S%H5750><s%> then they obeyed, <S%H8085><s%> and let them go. <S%H7971><s%>

But afterward <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they turned, <S%H7725><s%> and caused <S%H853><s%> the servants <S%H5650><s%> and the handmaids, <S%H8198><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> they had let go <S%H7971><s%> free, <S%H2670><s%> to return, <S%H7725><s%> and brought them into subjection <S%H3533><s%> for servants <S%H5650><s%> and for handmaids. <S%H8198><s%>
Therefore the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> I <S%H595><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with <S%H854><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that I brought them forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> out of the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of bondmen, <S%H5650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

At the end <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7093><s%> of seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> let ye go <S%H7971><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> <S%H853><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> a Hebrew, <S%H5680><s%> which <S%H834><s%> hath been sold <S%H4376><s%> unto thee; and when he hath served <S%H5647><s%> thee six <S%H8337><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> thou shalt let him go <S%H7971><s%> free <S%H2670><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> thee: but your fathers <S%H1><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, neither <S%H3808><s%> inclined <S%H5186><s%> <S%H853><s%> their ear. <S%H241><s%>

And ye <S%H859><s%> were now <S%H3117><s%> turned, <S%H7725><s%> and had done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> right <S%H3477><s%> in my sight, <S%H5869><s%> in proclaiming <S%H7121><s%> liberty <S%H1865><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his neighbor; <S%H7453><s%> and ye had made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me in the house <S%H1004><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is called <S%H7121><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> my name: <S%H8034><s%>

But ye turned <S%H7725><s%> and polluted <S%H2490><s%> <S%H853><s%> my name, <S%H8034><s%> and caused every man <S%H376><s%> <S%H853><s%> his servant, <S%H5650><s%> and every man <S%H376><s%> <S%H853><s%> his handmaid, <S%H8198><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> ye had set <S%H7971><s%> at liberty <S%H2670><s%> at their pleasure, <S%H5315><s%> to return, <S%H7725><s%> and brought them into subjection, <S%H3533><s%> <S%H853><s%> to be <S%H1961><s%> unto you for servants <S%H5650><s%> and for handmaids. <S%H8198><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> Ye <S%H859><s%> have not <S%H3808><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, in proclaiming <S%H7121><s%> liberty, <S%H1865><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> to his brother, <S%H251><s%> and every man <S%H376><s%> to his neighbor: <S%H7453><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I proclaim <S%H7121><s%> a liberty <S%H1865><s%> for you, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the sword, <S%H2719><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> the famine; <S%H7458><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> you to be removed <S%H2189><s%> into all <S%H3605><s%> the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And I will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> that have transgressed <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> my covenant, <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have not <S%H3808><s%> performed <S%H6965><s%> <S%H853><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they had made <S%H3772><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, when <S%H834><s%> they cut <S%H3772><s%> the calf <S%H5695><s%> in twain, <S%H8147><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the parts <S%H1335><s%> thereof,

The princes <S%H8269><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> the eunuchs, <S%H5631><s%> and the priests, <S%H3548><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> which passed <S%H5674><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the parts <S%H1335><s%> of the calf; <S%H5695><s%>

I will even give <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies, <S%H341><s%> and into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of them that seek <S%H1245><s%> their life: <S%H5315><s%> and their dead bodies <S%H5038><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> for meat <S%H3978><s%> unto the fowls <S%H5775><s%> of the heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and to the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and his princes <S%H8269><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies, <S%H341><s%> and into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of them that seek <S%H1245><s%> their life, <S%H5315><s%> and into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon's <S%H894><s%> army, <S%H2428><s%> which are gone up <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> you.

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will command, <S%H6680><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and cause them to return <S%H7725><s%> to <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> city; <S%H5892><s%> and they shall fight <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it, and take <S%H3920><s%> it, and burn <S%H8313><s%> it with fire: <S%H784><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> a desolation <S%H8077><s%> without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H369><s%> an inhabitant. <S%H3427><s%>
